scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/index.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.make-rules: firebase-bolt < rules.bolt > new-rules.json && ./bin/merge-rules extra-rules.json new-rules.json > rules.json && rm new-rules.json
scripts.test: eslint src/ tests/ e2e/ && mocha tests/index.js
scripts.test-e2e: eslint src/ tests/ e2e/ && firebase-bolt rules.bolt && firebase deploy:rules -f $SINGPATH_RULES_FB_ID && mocha e2e/index.js
